params.heroClass: Assume that heroController passes correct value of the heroClass for the given hero Also assume that the hero exists and alive

resetHeroCustomData(IStatController.Main.details: Reset custom hero data if something went wrong

DEATH_COUNT_HASH().notice: Custom data of the hero. Value is incremented on every life-chance lost

HERO_CLASS_HASH().notice: Virtual data, value is not stored to hero custom data, heroClass is taken from heroController by the index

buffHero(IStatController.MainState stora.notice: Calculate totalAttributes + all attributes of the items specified in {info}

initNewHero(IStatController.MainState st.notice: Initialize new hero, set up custom data, core data, changeable stats by default value

restoreLifeAndMana(IStatController.MainS.notice: scb-1009: Update current values of Life and mana during reinforcement as following: Reinforcement increases max value of life/mana on DELTA, current value of life/mana is increased on DELTA too
